item.title: 亚马逊 RTO 法令反映出新员工对公司文化不了解的担忧
item.description:
高层领导担心在家工作的政策会使下一代工人落后。【原文：

Senior leadership was concerned the work-from-home policy was leaving the next generation of workers behind.

】

item.title: 伊朗离拥有核武器还有多远？
item.description: 伊朗和以色列之间不断升级的冲突让全世界的目光重新聚焦于伊斯兰共和国的核野心，以及这些野心是否会让它拥有发射原子武器的能力。【原文：The escalating conflict between Iran and Israel has refocused the world’s attention on the Islamic Republic’s nuclear ambitions, and whether they’re giving it the capability to fire an atomic weapon.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国 10 年期国债收益率重回 4% 以上，交易员们在经济乐观情绪与中东紧张局势之间进行权衡，华尔街的专家们也转而更加看好股市。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The US 10-year yield is back above 4%, traders weigh economic optimism against tensions in the Middle East and Wall Street experts are turning more bullish on stocks. Here’s what’s moving markets.— David Goodman】

item.title: 中国经纪商不放假，为 "繁忙 "的开业做好准备
item.description: 中国的券商和证券交易所正在为周二的疯狂做准备，届时在岸市场将在长达一周的假期后重新开市，市场乐观情绪高涨，认为中国政府的刺激措施将使股市再次上扬。【原文：Brokerages and stock exchanges in China are gearing up for a frantic Tuesday when onshore markets reopen after a week-long holiday, with optimism running high that Beijing’s stimulus measures will give shares another leg up.】

item.title: Equinor 购入丹麦风电巨头 Orsted 25 亿美元股份
item.description: Equinor ASA 公司斥资 25 亿美元收购了丹麦风能巨头 Orsted A/S 公司的股份，将北欧地区最大的化石燃料公司之一与该地区最大的可再生能源开发商结合在一起。【原文：Equinor ASA acquired a $2.5 billion stake in Danish wind energy giant Orsted A/S, pairing one of the Nordic region’s biggest fossil fuel companies with its largest renewable power developer.】

item.title: 百达翡丽香港持有中国建设银行股份增至 8.3
item.description: 据香港交易所披露，10 月 3 日，Pictet Asset Management Hong Kong Ltd. 持有的中国建设银行股份从 0.01% 增至 8.32%。【原文：Pictet Asset Management Hong Kong Ltd.’s holding in China Construction Bank shares was raised to 8.32% on Oct. 3 from 0.01%, according to a Hong Kong Exchange disclosure.】

item.title: 亚利桑那州因 2020 年大选混乱而伤痕累累，加强投票安全
item.description: 新的锻铁围栏环绕着马里科帕县办公室，下个月将在这里计票。选举日当天，还将设置混凝土障碍物，并配备便衣警察和骑警。【原文：A new wrought-iron fence wraps around the Maricopa County office where votes will be counted next month. On Election Day, there’ll be concrete barriers too, along with plainclothes officers and mounted police.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 FalconX 在创纪录的一季度后寻求收购
item.description: 数字资产交易和经纪公司 FalconX 正在寻求收购，以迎接该行业预期的交易热潮。【原文：Digital-asset trading and brokerage firm FalconX is hunting for acquisitions ahead of an anticipated flurry of deal-making in the sector.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在英国就伦敦金属交易所关闭镍市场提起的上诉中败诉
item.description: 艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在英国就伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）制止镍市场空头挤压的争议性决定提出上诉，但最终败诉。【原文：Elliott Investment Management lost its UK appeal over the London Metal Exchange’s controversial decision to halt a runaway short squeeze in the nickel market.】

item.title: 据说奇瑞将考虑在香港为价值 70 亿美元的汽车业务上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，奇瑞控股有限公司（Chery Holdings Co.【原文：Chery Holdings Co. is considering a Hong Kong initial public offering for its automotive unit that could value it at about 50 billion yuan ($7.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亿万富翁索洛兹将其子赶出波兰公用事业公司董事会
item.description: 波兰亿万富翁齐格蒙特-索洛兹（Zygmunt Solorz）将自己的两个儿子赶出了公用事业公司 ZE PAK SA 的监事会，加深了家族对其企业集团（还包括媒体和电信）控制权的争斗。【原文：Polish billionaire Zygmunt Solorz ousted his two sons from the supervisory board of utility ZE PAK SA, deepening a family feud over control of his conglomerate which also includes media and telecoms.】

item.title: 雪佛龙以 65 亿美元出售加拿大油砂和页岩资产
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）同意以 65 亿美元的价格将其在部分油砂和页岩资产中的股份出售给加拿大自然资源有限公司（Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. ）。【原文：Chevron Corp. agreed to sell its stakes in some oil sands and shale assets to Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. for $6.5 billion.】

item.title: 丹格特抢夺尼日利亚原油，撼动大西洋石油市场
item.description: 随着非洲最大的炼油厂改造该地区的进出口市场，丹格特炼油厂将在未来两个月内每天接收多达 40 万桶尼日利亚原油。【原文：Dangote oil refinery is due to take in up to 400,000 barrels a day of Nigerian crude over the coming two months as Africa’s largest plant transforms the region’s import and export markets.】

item.title: 亚洲炼油商感叹沙特石油价格昂贵，利润和伊朗风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 利润微薄的亚洲炼油商对沙特的最新提价表示不满，称沙特的提价幅度超出预期，以反映伊朗的供应风险。【原文：Asian oil refiners hit by lean margins are baulking at Saudi’s latest price hike, saying the kingdom raised prices by more than expected to reflect Iranian supply risks.】

item.title: 法国财政部长承诺预算将遵守欧盟规则
item.description: 法国财政部长安托万-阿尔芒（Antoine Armand）表示，法国政府将于本周提交一份尊重欧盟规则的预算，同时他也在努力就该国赤字失控问题向欧盟伙伴和市场作出保证。【原文：French Finance Minister Antoine Armand said the government will present a budget this week that respects European Union rules as he seeks to reassure partners in the bloc and markets over the country’s runaway deficit.】

item.title: 荷兰航空公司荷航寻求欧盟采取措施遏制中国市场竞争
item.description: 荷兰国旗航空公司荷兰皇家航空公司（KLM NV）呼吁欧盟采取措施，应对获准飞越俄罗斯领空的中国航空公司的 "不公平 "竞争。【原文：Dutch flag carrier KLM NV has called on the European Union to come up with measures to counter “unfair” competition from Chinese airlines that are cleared to fly over Russia’s airspace.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师称就业惊喜预示股市向好
item.description: 华尔街的两位顶级策略师对美国股市的看法变得更加乐观，因为有迹象表明，美国的劳动力市场强劲、经济具有韧性，而且利率也在放宽。【原文：Two of Wall Street’s top strategists have turned more optimistic about US stocks on signs of a robust labor market, economic resilience and easing interest rates.】

item.title: 奇数：多策略对冲基金背后的数学（播客）
item.description: 多策略对冲基金在华尔街仍然风靡一时，但 pod shop 的实际含义是什么？在本期节目中，我们采访了 Freestone Grove Partners 的联合创始人 Dan Morillo，他曾是 Citadel（最成功的多策略对冲基金之一）的合伙人兼股票量化研究主管。【原文：Multi-strategy hedge funds are still all the rage on Wall Street, but what does it actually mean to be a pod shop and how are they being set up? On this episode, we speak with Dan Morillo, co-founder of Freestone Grove Partners and formerly a partner and head of equity quantitative research at Citadel (one of the most successful multi-strats out there.) While lots of people tend to talk about multi-strategy hedge funds as one big blob, he argues that there are important differences in their busi】

item.title: 联合国称，2023 年东南亚诈骗者将盗取高达 370 亿美元的资金
item.description: 联合国表示，网络犯罪集团去年敛财高达 370 亿美元，尽管执法力度不断加强，但它们仍在东南亚各地加紧行动。【原文：Cyber crime syndicates raked in as much as $37 billion last year and are intensifying operations across Southeast Asia despite mounting law enforcement efforts, the United Nations said.】

item.title: 尼康披露 EssilorLuxottica 持股 5%后股价大涨
item.description: 尼康公司（Nikon Corp. ）披露法国眼镜制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica SA）已持有该公司 5.1%的股份，成为 ASML Holding NV 的日本竞争对手。【原文：Nikon Corp.’s shares surged their most in two months after disclosing that French eye-wear maker EssilorLuxottica SA has taken a 5.1% stake in the smaller Japanese rival to ASML Holding NV.】

item.title: 欧拉电动车首次公开募股的巨大收益在社交媒体口水战中迅速褪色
item.description: 印度最大的电动摩托车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 周一暴跌，因为该公司首席执行官与一位脱口秀喜剧演员之间的网上争吵扩大了人们对该公司产品的担忧。【原文：India’s biggest e-scooter maker Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. plunged on Monday after an online spat between its chief executive officer and a stand-up comedian amplified concerns about the company’s products.】

item.title: 中国股指期货触顶，交易商寻求增加风险敞口
item.description: 由于中国放假一周，交易商将注意力转向了在新加坡和香港上市的期货。【原文：With China out for a weeklong holiday, traders have turned their attention to futures listed in Singapore and Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美联储重新思考，美国关键收益率自 8 月以来首次接近 4
item.description: 两年期和 10 年期美国国债收益率几乎回到了 4% 的水平，这是自 8 月份以来从未有过的水平，因为一份爆炸性的就业报告迫使交易商重新评估货币政策的前景。【原文：Yields on two and 10-year US Treasuries are nearly back to 4%, a level not seen since August after a blowout jobs report forces traders to reassess the outlook for monetary policy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚国家航空公司寻求对最大机场的部分控制权
item.description: 肯尼亚国家航空公司（Kenya Airways Plc）希望获得首都最大机场的部分控制权，即使当局正在与私营企业讨论特许经营该地区航空枢纽的问题。【原文：Kenya Airways Plc, the state-controlled national carrier, wants to gain some control of the capital’s biggest airport even as authorities discuss concessions with private players to run the regional aviation hub.】

item.title: 越南总理希望今年经济增长超过 7
item.description: 越南总理范明正下令各部委采取 "严厉措施"，将今年的经济增长率提高到 7% 以上。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh ordered ministries to implement “drastic measures” to boost economic growth to more than 7% this year, following an unexpected acceleration in the previous quarter.】

item.title: 历峰集团将 Yoox Net-A-Porter 出售给德国的 Mytheresa
item.description: 历峰集团同意将陷入困境的在线时尚业务 Yoox Net-A-Porter 出售给 Mytheresa，以换取这家德国电子商务公司的股份。【原文：Richemont agreed to offload its troubled online fashion business Yoox Net-A-Porter to Mytheresa in exchange for shares in the German e-commerce company.】

item.title: 沙特香水制造商首次公开募股上涨 30%，IPO 热潮仍在继续
item.description: 总部位于沙特阿拉伯的香水生产商 Al Majed for Oud Co. 在利雅得的首次交易中以允许的最大涨幅跳涨，这表明中东地区的上市需求依然强劲。【原文：Saudi Arabia-based perfume maker Al Majed for Oud Co. jumped by the maximum allowed in its Riyadh trading debut in a sign that demand for Middle Eastern listings remains robust.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦下令调查两名中国人在武装分子袭击中丧生事件
item.description: 巴基斯坦正在调查周日在港口城市卡拉奇发生的造成两名中国公民死亡的袭击事件，因为这个南亚国家正在努力遏制针对其重要经济伙伴利益的日益猖獗的武装活动。【原文：Pakistan is investigating an attack in the port city of Karachi that killed two Chinese citizens on Sunday, as the South Asian nation struggles to curb rising militancy targeting interests of its key economic partner.】

item.title: 泰国政府寻求提高通胀目标以实现降息
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，泰国财政部计划将明年的通胀目标提高到 1.5%-3.5% 之间，这将增加央行下调关键利率的压力。【原文：Thailand’s Finance Ministry plans to propose a higher inflation target of 1.5%-3.5% for next year, adding pressure on the central bank to cut its key interest rate, according to people familiar with the matter.】
